briefTitle: PLATINUM Trial to Assess the PROMUS Element Stent System for Treatment of De Novo Coronary Artery Lesions-Pharmacokinetics (PLATINUM PK)
officialTitle: PLATINUM: A Prospective, Randomized, Multicenter Trial to Assess an Everolimus-Eluting Coronary Stent System (PROMUS Element™) for the Treatment of up to Two De Novo Coronary Artery Lesions - Pharmacokinetics Sub-trial

interventions.name: PROMUS Element Everolimus-Eluting Coronary Stent System
Thienopyridine
otherNames: A brand name for clopidogrel is PLAVIX.
A brand name for ticlopidine is TICLID.

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the PROMUS Element™ Everolimus-Eluting Coronary Stent System for the treatment of patients with up to 2 de novo atherosclerotic coronary artery lesions. The lesions are located in vessels that are average-sized.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Predose <24 hours; post dose at 30 minutes, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24, 48, and 72 hours
